title: Letterhead, "Gencon Chartering Corporation, Ship Brokers and Agents, New York", early–mid-20th century
title_raw: Gencon Chartering Corporation, Ship Brokers and Agents, New York
medium: Letterpress: blue,red, white, yellow ink on light blue wove paper
inscribed:
Company name imprinted from upper center to upper right:  GENCON CHARTERING CORPORATION/Ship Brokers and Agents
Imprinted below logo and title: 866 THIRD AVENUE, NEW YORK, N.Y. 10022.TELEPHONE 421-4864.  Imprinted in smaller typeface size, at upper right (but below telephone number): CABLES:"GENCHARTCO" NEW YORK/ TELEX: ITT 420298 RCA 222606 / TELETYPEWRITER: 710-581-6051
description: Logo, at upper left,  comprised of G/C/C in raised blue on three "banners" with  short vertical stripes: one of blue/yellow, and two made of red/ white, and blue stipes . Company name to the right of logo; company address and telephone below.

tombstone.epitaph: Letterhead, "Gencon Chartering Corporation, Ship Brokers and Agents, New York", early–mid-20th century. Letterpress: blue,red, white, yellow ink on light blue wove paper. Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1998-64-8.
